item.title: Ashley Cain: Into the Danger Zone - Series 1: 1. Rio’s Favela Wars
item.description: Ashley is in Brazil to meet young men living in some of Rio’s most dangerous favelas.

item.title: Kinahan: The True Story of Ireland’s Mafia - Series 1: 1. Birth of a Cartel
item.description: The story of the Kinahan cartel, one of the world’s most feared criminal organisations.
